ygData.subject: RE: Jboots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant Hates Druids. Or should I say Brad hates Druids. Just look at the AC of our PoF Stuff. Our Boots are AC 6 where Clerics boots are AC 15. Shesh Casters
ygData.messageBody:
Verant Hates Druids. Or should I say Brad hates Druids. Just look at the AC
of our PoF Stuff. Our Boots are AC 6 where Clerics boots are AC 15. Shesh
Casters didn't lose any thing Rubi Yet they have Amor Quest in the Temple.
Oh Well. I still like my Druid, but could still use some better armor &
Weapons



I have heard that druids will NOT be getting new stuff. They didn't loose it
with Rubi anyways. *shrug* I think Verant likes Druids less than Shamans ;-)
